GameInformation - Class in Classes
The GameInformation class is a variable container, holding all of the important information about the game.
getBalls() - Method in class Classes.GameInformation

Gets a List of all balls that belong to this game

getBallSize() - Method in class Classes.GameInformation

Gets the size all balls should have

getBilliardTable() - Method in class Classes.GameInformation

Gets the BilliardTable the game is played on

getBounds() - Method in class Classes.BilliardTable

Gets the bounds of the table

getColor() - Method in class Classes.Balls.ColorBalls

Gets the color of the ball

getGravity() - Method in class Classes.Balls.GravityBall

Gets the gravity

getGrowingSpeed() - Method in class Classes.Balls.PulsatingBall

Gets the speed at which the ball is growing and shrinking

getMass() - Method in class Classes.Ball

Gets the balls mass

getMaxSize() - Method in class Classes.Balls.PulsatingBall

Gets the balls maximal size

getMaxX() - Method in class Classes.BilliardTable

Gets the maximal distance between the top of the screen and the table

getMaxY() - Method in class Classes.BilliardTable

Gets the maximal distance between the left of the screen and the table

getMinSize() - Method in class Classes.Balls.PulsatingBall

Gets the balls minimal size

getMinX() - Method in class Classes.BilliardTable

Gets the minimal distance between the top of the screen and the table

getMinY() - Method in class Classes.BilliardTable

Gets the minimal distance between the left of the screen and the table

getNumber() - Method in class Classes.Balls.NumberedBall

Gets the balls number

getPos() - Method in class Classes.Ball

Gets the balls position

getPos() - Method in class Classes.BilliardTable

Gets the position of the table

getSize() - Method in class Classes.Ball

Gets the balls size

getSize() - Method in class Classes.BilliardTable

Gets the size of the table

getTracePoints() - Method in class Classes.Balls.TraceBall

Gets the balls number
The length of the trace will roughly be 5* this number in pixels

getVel() - Method in class Classes.Ball

Gets the balls velocity

GravityBall - Class in Classes.Balls
The GravityBall class represents a ball being pulled down by gravity.
GravityBall(double, double[], double[], GameInformation) - Constructor for class Classes.Balls.GravityBall

Creates a new ball affected by gravity

GravityBall(double, double[], GameInformation) - Constructor for class Classes.Balls.GravityBall

Creates a new ball affected by gravity
